name: Relation to chapter 371
text: §383-101  Relation to chapter 371.  The provisions of chapter 371 with respect to the adoption, amendment, repeal, and review of rules and regulations shall not apply with respect to rules and regulations under this chapter. [L 1941, c 304, §1, pt of subs 32; RL 1945, §4280; RL 1955, §93-100; HRS §383-101]
